game

Class Logic

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Logic
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HotseatLogic, OnlineLogic

    public abstract class Logic
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles the game logic. Abstract class, the subclasses OnlineLogic and HotseatLogic are used for the different game modes.
    Author:
    Andr√© Hansson

      • checkMovablePawns

        public void checkMovablePawns()
        Checks the game board for remaining movable pawns. Ends the game if any player has run out of movable pawns.
